-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Library for reading phd sequence files
--   
@package biophd
@version 0.0.7

module Bio.Sequence.PhdTag
data PhdTag
PhdTag :: String -> String -> (Offset, Offset) -> LocalTime -> Maybe String -> PhdTag
tagType :: PhdTag -> String
source :: PhdTag -> String
unpaddedReadPosition :: PhdTag -> (Offset, Offset)
date :: PhdTag -> LocalTime
comment :: PhdTag -> Maybe String
instance Eq PhdTag
instance Show PhdTag

module Bio.Sequence.PhdData
data Phd
Phd :: Comment -> DNABlock -> Maybe [PhdTag] -> Phd
comment :: Phd -> Comment
dnaBlock :: Phd -> DNABlock
phdTags :: Phd -> Maybe [PhdTag]
data Comment
Comment :: FilePath -> String -> String -> String -> Int -> LocalTime -> Int -> Int -> Maybe String -> String -> String -> Comment
chromatFile :: Comment -> FilePath
abiThumbprint :: Comment -> String
phredVersion :: Comment -> String
callMethod :: Comment -> String
qualityLevels :: Comment -> Int
time :: Comment -> LocalTime
traceArrayMinIndex :: Comment -> Int
traceArrayMaxIndex :: Comment -> Int
trim :: Comment -> Maybe String
chem :: Comment -> String
dye :: Comment -> String
data DNABlock
DNABlock :: SeqLabel -> SeqData -> QualData -> [Int] -> DNABlock
label :: DNABlock -> SeqLabel
bases :: DNABlock -> SeqData
qualities :: DNABlock -> QualData
traceIndices :: DNABlock -> [Int]
defaultComment :: Comment
defaultDNABlock :: DNABlock
instance Eq Comment
instance Eq DNABlock
instance Show Phd
instance BioSeqQual DNABlock
instance BioSeq DNABlock
instance Show DNABlock
instance Show Comment

module Bio.Sequence.Phd
data Phd
Phd :: Comment -> DNABlock -> Maybe [PhdTag] -> Phd
comment :: Phd -> Comment
dnaBlock :: Phd -> DNABlock
phdTags :: Phd -> Maybe [PhdTag]

-- | Parse a .phd file, extracting the contents as a PHD
readPhd :: FilePath -> IO Phd

-- | Parse .phd contents from a handle
hReadPhd :: Handle -> IO Phd
readPhdTags :: FilePath -> IO (Maybe [PhdTag])
